Hero

The main attraction of your site. It's either an image, slideshow, text, etc., all the content needed to make your site stand out.



Basic Setup

Put all your content inside a class name ".hero", and use ".hero-content" for padding styling around the content.


Heading 1

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Quasi, consequatur, at tempore aspernatur impedit quaerat magni placeat ipsa quam distinctio!

Button


HTML example markup
<div class="hero">
	<div class="hero-content">
		...
	</div>	
</div>


Hero with Images

We usually see this often, an Intro words on top of an image. It is a flexible layout, and can adopt whether Responsive or a Fixed Image.

It uses Vertical Alignment (see how it works under Utilities). Followed by a class name ".hero-intro". It also uses a Grid System to compensate the width of the content.

Heading 1

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Quasi, consequatur, at tempore aspernatur impedit quaerat magni placeat ipsa quam distinctio!

Button


HTML example markup
<div class="hero">
	<div class="hero-image">
		<img src="..." alt="..." />
		<div class="hero-content">
			<div class="valign">
				<div class="valign-content">
					<div class="hero-intro grid-6">
						...
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>	
	</div>	
</div>


SASS Configuration Variables

// Hero - Basic Styling
$hero-bg: $color-gray-lighten !default;
$hero-color: $color-default !default;
$hero-font-size: 14px !default;
$hero-border: 0px solid #000000 !default;

// Hero - Shadows
$hero-shadow: $color-black !default;
$hero-shadow-opacity: 0 !default;
$hero-shadow-category: 3px 6px 13px 0px !default; // h-shadow, v-shadow, blur, spread

// Hero Image - Height
$hero-image-height-default: 400px !default;
$hero-image-height-small: 200px !default;
$hero-image-height-medium: 300px !default;

// Hero Intro - Basic Styling
$hero-intro-bg: rgba($color-tertiary, 0.5) !default;

// Hero Intro - padding styling
$hero-intro-padding-top-default: 15px !default;
$hero-intro-padding-bottom-default: 15px !default;
$hero-intro-padding-right-default: 20px !default;
$hero-intro-padding-left-default: 20px !default;

// Hero Intro - padding for Small screen
$hero-intro-padding-top-small: inherit !default;
$hero-intro-padding-bottom-small: inherit !default;
$hero-intro-padding-right-small: inherit !default;
$hero-intro-padding-left-small:	inherit !default;

// Hero Intro - padding for Medium screen
$hero-intro-padding-top-medium:	inherit !default;
$hero-intro-padding-bottom-medium: inherit !default;
$hero-intro-padding-right-medium: inherit !default;
$hero-intro-padding-left-medium: inherit !default;

// Hero Content - Basic Styling
$hero-content-bg: none !default;
$hero-content-color: $color-default !default;

// Hero Content - padding styling
$hero-content-padding-top-default: 45px !default;
$hero-content-padding-bottom-default: 45px !default;
$hero-content-padding-right-default: 45px !default;
$hero-content-padding-left-default: 45px !default;

// Hero Content - padding for small screen
$hero-content-padding-top-small: 20px !default;
$hero-content-padding-bottom-small: 20px !default;
$hero-content-padding-right-small: 20px !default;
$hero-content-padding-left-small: 20px !default;

// Hero Content - padding for medium screen
$hero-content-padding-top-medium: 30px !default;
$hero-content-padding-bottom-medium: 30px !default;
$hero-content-padding-right-medium: 30px !default;
$hero-content-padding-left-medium: 30px !default;

See config.scss for complete reference.
